nails-description: For specials events as well as your everyday life, embellish your nails while protecting them.
wax-description: Temporary or permanent, we will find the method that suits your needs, your skin type and your hair.
pedicure-description: Our feet support us every day, we have to take good care of them from time to time.
manicure-description: To take care of your hands and nails, any time of year.
